description: Update usage documentation to reflect the new --output-csv option.

instructions: Locate the section that describes the `--list-models` command.
Add a new paragraph or update the existing description for `--list-models` to include information about the new optional `--output-csv` parameter.
Clearly state that the `--output-csv` flag will output the model list in CSV format to standard output.

Provide a clear example demonstrating how to use the `--list-models` command with the `--output-csv` flag, potentially showing how to redirect the output to a file (e.g., `aiwhisperer --list-models --output-csv > models.csv`).
Explain the structure and content of the CSV output, specifying the columns included (e.g., model name, provider, context window, etc., based on the implementation in `src/ai_whisperer/main.py`).
Ensure the documentation is clear, concise, and easy for users to understand.
constraints: Do not alter other documentation files.
The documentation must accurately reflect the behavior of the `--output-csv` option as implemented in `src/ai_whisperer/main.py`.
validation_criteria: The documentation for the `--list-models` command in `docs/usage.md` explicitly mentions the `--output-csv` parameter.
The purpose of the `--output-csv` parameter (outputting CSV format) is clearly explained.
An example usage of `--list-models --output-csv` is present in `docs/usage.md`.
Information describing the content or columns of the CSV output is included in `docs/usage.md`.
